title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 165: Featuring Darren Dreger
description:
On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by NHL Insider Darren Dreger of TSN to discuss all the crazy things going on in the NHL right now. Dregs gives us his take on the Florida Panther Head Coaching situation, why Phil Housley was fired and a bunch more. He also gives us his Stanley Cup pick and talks a little about a future lockout and the possibility of it happening. The boys then preview five playoff series that will be played on before Thursday and give their picks for each series.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
